text: Advertisement Taylor Swift and her beau Joe Alwyn looked like happy lovebirds on their romantic summer vacation in the Turks And Caicos. The 28 - year - old pop star and the 27 - year - old British actor were seen walking hand - in - hand on the beach while carrying cold drinks in images that surfaced on Monday. The power couple were at the exclusive destination for several days working on their tans.
